text: Events from the year 1882 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Alexander III ==Events== * * * * * Tcherny railway accident * May Laws * Pavlovka (meteorite) * Peasants' Land Bank ==Births== *January 4 - Aristarkh Lentulov, painter and set designer (died 1943) *June 17 - Igor Stravinsky, composer, pianist, and conductor (died 1971) ==Deaths== * - Friedrich Benjamin von Lütke, Russian navigator, geographer, and Arctic explorer. (b. 1797) * * * ==References== 1882 in Russia Category:Years of the 19th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1882 in Russia
